versos: (baalim) Judges 2:11 - "Then the Israelites did evil in the eyes of the Lord and served the Baals.";;;

(spoilers) Isaiah 16:4 - "Let mine outcasts dwell with thee, Moab; be thou a covert to them from the face of the spoiler: for the extortioner is at an end, the spoiler ceaseth, the oppressors are consumed out of the land.";;;
(ehud) Judges 3:15 - Again the Israelites cried out to the Lord
(silence) Psalm 46:10 - "He says, 'Be still, and know that I am God; I will be exalted among the nations, I will be exalted in the earth.'";;;
(message) Acts 10:36 - "He sent his message to the people of Israel, proclaiming the gospel of peace through Jesus Christ, who is Lord of all.";;;
(porch) 2 Chronicles 29:7 - They also shut the doors of the porch and put out the lamps
(mantle) 2 Kings 2:8 - "Elijah took his cloak, rolled it up and struck the water with it. The water divided to the right and to the left, and the two of them crossed over on dry ground.";;;
(thirsty) "Let anyone who is thirsty come to me and drink." - John 7:37;;;
(nail) Colossians 2:14 - "Having canceled the charge of our legal indebtedness, which stood against us and condemned us; he has taken it away, nailing it to the cross.";;;
(eshtaol) Judges 13:25 - And the Spirit of the LORD began to stir him while he was in Mahaneh Dan
(dagon) 1 Samuel 5:2 - They carried the ark of God into the temple of dagon and set it beside dagon.;;;
(temples) 2 Corinthians 6:16 - "...For we are the temple of the living God.";;;

(coast) Acts 27:12 - And because the haven was not commodious to winter in, the more part advised to depart thence also, if by any means they might attain to Phenice, and there to winter; which is an haven of Crete, and lieth toward the south west and north west.;;;
(dropped) Isaiah 64:1 - "Oh, that you would rend the heavens and come down, that the mountains would tremble before you";;;

(highways) Isaiah 35:8 - And a highway will be there; it will be called the Way of Holiness; it will be for those who walk on that Way. The unclean will not journey on it; wicked fools will not go about on it.
(awake) "awake, my glory awake, O harp and lyre I will awake the dawn." - Psalm 57:8;;;
(pen) Ecclesiastes 12:11 - "The words of the wise are like goads, their collected sayings like firmly embedded nailsgiven by one shepherd.";;;
